oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The EU research project, CERTCOST, has issued the first digital CERTCOST newsletter. Despite the fact that organic certification and its costs might be a somewhat dry subject from a consumerâ€™s point of view, we intend to present the results in a eatable manner. The International Center for Research in Organic Food Systems, ICROFS, is responsible for dissemination of the CERTCOST project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rebsdorf, Simon Olling (2010) CERTCOST News. CERTCOST News, 2010 (1), pp. 1-8.
